languages.text: "Я слышу голоса мертвецов... Так явно, словно они стоят за спиной".
"I hear the voices of the dead... as if they were standing right behind me."
languages.original_text: "Я слышу голоса мертвецов... Так явно, словно они стоят за спиной".

languages.text: "Ich höre die Stimmen der Toten ... als wären sie unmittelbar hinter mir."
languages.original_text: "I hear the voices of the dead... as if they were standing right behind me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich höre die Stimmen der Toten ... als wären sie unmittelbar hinter mir."

languages.text: « J'entends les voix des morts... comme s'ils se tenaient juste derrière moi. »
languages.original_text: "I hear the voices of the dead... as if they were standing right behind me."

traits.locale_text: « J'entends les voix des morts... comme s'ils se tenaient juste derrière moi. »

languages.text: «Escucho la voz de los muertos... Es como si estuvieran justo detrás de mí».
languages.original_text: "I hear the voices of the dead... as if they were standing right behind me."

traits.locale_text: «Escucho la voz de los muertos... Es como si estuvieran justo detrás de mí».

languages.text: 「死の声が聞こえてくる…まるで私のすぐ後ろに立っているかのようだわ」
languages.original_text: "I hear the voices of the dead... as if they were standing right behind me."

traits.locale_text: 「死の声が聞こえてくる…まるで私のすぐ後ろに立っているかのようだわ」

languages.text: “我听到了死者的声音……仿佛他们就站在我身后。”
languages.original_text: "I hear the voices of the dead... as if they were standing right behind me."

traits.locale_text: “我听到了死者的声音……仿佛他们就站在我身后。”

languages.original_text: "I hear the voices of the dead... as if they were standing right behind me."

languages.text: "Sanki tam arkamda dikilmişler gibi... Ölülerin seslerini duyarım."
